summary.p: Zwick's brother [Konrad] returned yesterday [from the Imperial Diet in Regensburg]; as soon as he has presented his report to the council, Bullinger will also receive the news. The death of [Simon] Grynaeus has shaken everyone.

div.p: Greetings. Yesterday my brother returned. He has not yet made his report to the council. Once that is done, we will also know the details, which I will not withhold from you in the next letter.
We are all shaken by the death of Grynaeus. Yours, Johannes Zwick.
To Lord Heinrich Bullinger, the most vigilant pastor of the church in Zurich.
